meanings.definition: Carry out a task or action
meanings.sent1: I will perform my homework after school.
meanings.sent2: The magician will perform a trick with cards.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to perform a dance but ended up doing the robot.
meanings.sent4: Her voice can perform magic, enchanting all who listen.
meanings.sent5: The actor's performance on stage left the audience in awe.

meanings.sent1: The band will perform at the music festival.
meanings.sent2: The circus performers will perform amazing stunts.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to perform a magic trick with a disappearing toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The stars perform a dance in the night sky, captivating all who watch.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's performance had the audience laughing uncontrollably.

meanings.sent1: I need to perform my responsibilities as a student.
meanings.sent2: The new machine can perform various tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The toaster decided to perform a dance instead of toasting bread.
meanings.sent4: The sun performs its duty every day, bringing light and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's skilled hands perform life-saving surgeries.
